sentences.en: A sort of halo, an occidental glow, came over life then.
sentences.cn: 那时候,就有一种祥光, 一片晚霞, 在生活上,笼罩缭绕.

sentences.en: But what this experiment demonstrates is that although we can understand the halo effect intellectually, we often have no idea when it is actually happening.
sentences.cn: 但是上面这个实验所证明的是，虽然我们在智力上可以理解光环效应，但是我们通常不知道它到底什么时候在起作用。

sentences.en: Dozens of bees circled his tousled brown curls in an angle's halo.
sentences.cn: 一群蜜蜂绕着他那蓬乱的棕色卷发,好像天使的光环.

sentences.en: Halo virtual world in contrast, blackness is the edge began increasing.
sentences.cn: 晕虚的网点与之相反, 黑度是由边沿开始慢慢增大的.

sentences.en: He was treated administration of antibiotics and application of a halo - vest .
sentences.cn: 对其应用抗生素及 HaloVest 外固定架治疗.

sentences.en: Imprinted with Halo fanciful and direct , the image is not clear, flat.
sentences.cn: 痕迹边际有晕虚不干脆, 图像不澄辉, 无条理.

sentences.en: Microtubules often have a halo around the outside which is only slightly stained.
sentences.cn: 围绕着微管的外周,常有一层仅能着色很浅的晕圈.

sentences.en: R " is a replaceable function , e . g . acetoxy, methoxy, their acyloxy and alkoxy homologs or halo.
sentences.cn: R ” 是取化基,如乙氧基 、 甲氧基及它们的环氧和烷氧同系物或卤基.

sentences.en: She angrily slung a scarf around her head, flattening her halo of hair.
sentences.cn: 她气鼓鼓地把头巾裹在头上，发髻都被压扁了。

sentences.en: She played the part of an angel, complete with wings and a halo.
sentences.cn: 她扮演天使，身上的双翼和头上的光轮一应俱全。

sentences.en: Smoke wreathed his head like a halo.
sentences.cn: 他头上烟雾缭绕,宛如一圈光环.

sentences.en: The distant planet Jupiter appears by chance on the halo's right.
sentences.cn: 距离我们遥远的木星偶然地出现在了光环的右上角.

sentences.en: The method can be used to effectively control the beam halo - chaos.
sentences.cn: 利用该方法可实现束晕 - 混沌的有效控制.

sentences.en: There is a strict halo of seriousness around science in Egypt.
sentences.cn: 在埃及，科学被一个严肃性的严格光环包围着。

sentences.en: This even applied to the parasitic Flood infestation on Halo.
sentences.cn: 甚至应用到光晕上那寄生的害虫洪魔身上.

sentences.en: Wearing a bee halo, Mark hopped over one fence, then another.
sentences.cn: 戴着蜜蜂的光环，马克跳过一个又一个篱笆。

sentences.en: Were there not the brilliant particles of a halo in the air about his head?
sentences.cn: 他头上的空中不是有光环在光芒四射 吗 ?

sentences.en: When there is solar halo , it will rain; when there is lunar halo , it will blow.
sentences.cn: 日晕而雨, 月晕而风.

phrases.tran_cn: 晕轮效应；连锁反应；[心]成见效应

trans.tran_en: a bright circle that is often shown above or around the heads of holy people in religious art
